pages.text: The $(mob)Wraith$() is a monster that spawns in the $(thing)Nether$() on patches of $(item)Soul Sand$(). It imitates the sound of random mobs and chases players on sight to attack them in melee.$(p)It is immune to knockback and its attack inflict $(thing)Slowness$() on their target and causes the $(mob)Wraith$() to jump backwards.

$(mob)Wraiths$() drop $(item)Soul Beads$() on death. They can be consumed to inflict $(thing)Curse$() on the eater for several minutes, causing monsters to spawn much more frequently around.$(p)It can also be crafted into $(item)Soul Powder$(), which when used shows the direction of the nearest $(thing)Nether Fortress$().
